languages.text: {n}Ваш уверенный голос эхом отдается от металлических стен. Друкари мигает. Затем еще раз. Вам начинает казаться, словно зеркальная поверхность его глаз идет рябью — помимо отражения в них появляется что-то, отдаленно напоминающее сознание.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ваш уверенный голос эхом отдается от металлических стен. Друкари мигает. Затем еще раз. Вам начинает казаться, словно зеркальная поверхность его глаз идет рябью — помимо отражения в них появляется что-то, отдаленно напоминающее сознание.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

languages.text: {n}Your confident voice reverberates through the metal room. The Drukhari blinks. Then blinks again. The mirror-like surface of his eyes seems to ripple, as if something else is beginning to surface apart from the soulless reflection, something vaguely resembling awareness.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ваш уверенный голос эхом отдается от металлических стен. Друкари мигает. Затем еще раз. Вам начинает казаться, словно зеркальная поверхность его глаз идет рябью — помимо отражения в них появляется что-то, отдаленно напоминающее сознание.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Your confident voice reverberates through the metal room. The Drukhari blinks. Then blinks again. The mirror-like surface of his eyes seems to ripple, as if something else begins to surface apart from the soulless reflection, something vaguely resembling awareness.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

traits.locale_text: {n}Your confident voice reverberates through the metal room. The Drukhari blinks. Then blinks again. The mirror-like surface of his eyes seems to ripple, as if something else begins to surface apart from the soulless reflection, something vaguely resembling awareness.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

traits.locale_text: {n}Your confident voice reverberates through the metal room. The Drukhari blinks. Then blinks again. The mirror-like surface of his eyes seems to ripple, as if something else is beginning to surface apart from the soulless reflection, something vaguely resembling awareness.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

traits.locale_text: {n}Your confident voice reverberates through the metal room. The Drukhari blinks. Then blinks again. The mirror-like surface of his eyes seems to ripple, as if something else is beginning to surface apart from the soulless reflection, something vaguely resembling awareness.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

traits.locale_text: {n}Your confident voice reverberates through the metal room. The Drukhari blinks. Then blinks again. The mirror-like surface of his eyes seems to ripple, as if something else is beginning to surface apart from the soulless reflection, something vaguely resembling awareness.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

languages.text: {n}Votre voix assurée résonne entre les parois de métal de la pièce. Le Drukhari cligne des yeux. Une fois, deux fois. Le miroir de jais de ses pupilles ondoie légèrement, comme si une certaine forme de conscience tentait d'en briser la surface sans âme.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your confident voice reverberates through the metal room. The Drukhari blinks. Then blinks again. The mirror-like surface of his eyes seems to ripple, as if something else is beginning to surface apart from the soulless reflection, something vaguely resembling awareness.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Votre voix assurée résonne entre les parois de métal de la pièce. Le Drukhari cligne des yeux. Une fois, deux fois. Le miroir de jais de ses pupilles ondoie légèrement, comme si une certaine forme de conscience tentait d'en briser la surface sans âme.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

languages.text: {n}あなたの自信に満ちた声が金属製の部屋に響き渡る。デュカーリは一度まばたきをしてから、さらに二度目のまばたきをする。鏡のような目の表面が波打っているように見えた。まるで、魂のない反射ではなく、ぼんやりと意識に似た何かが浮かび始めているかのようだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your confident voice reverberates through the metal room. The Drukhari blinks. Then blinks again. The mirror-like surface of his eyes seems to ripple, as if something else is beginning to surface apart from the soulless reflection, something vaguely resembling awareness.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたの自信に満ちた声が金属製の部屋に響き渡る。デュカーリは一度まばたきをしてから、さらに二度目のまばたきをする。鏡のような目の表面が波打っているように見えた。まるで、魂のない反射ではなく、ぼんやりと意識に似た何かが浮かび始めているかのようだ。{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

languages.text: {n}你充满自信的声音回荡在房间里。玛拉斋眨了眨眼睛，随后再次眨了眨眼。他如同镜子一样的双眼似乎泛起了波澜，仿佛除了没有灵魂的反射之外，还浮现出了某种别的东西，某种类似于意识的东西。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your confident voice reverberates through the metal room. The Drukhari blinks. Then blinks again. The mirror-like surface of his eyes seems to ripple, as if something else is beginning to surface apart from the soulless reflection, something vaguely resembling awareness.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你充满自信的声音回荡在房间里。玛拉斋眨了眨眼睛，随后再次眨了眨眼。他如同镜子一样的双眼似乎泛起了波澜，仿佛除了没有灵魂的反射之外，还浮现出了某种别的东西，某种类似于意识的东西。{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

languages.text: {n}Deine selbstbewusste Stimme hallt durch den metallenen Raum. Der Drukhari blinzelt. Blinzelt erneut. Die spiegelähnliche Oberfläche seiner Augen scheint sich zu kräuseln, als würde etwas anderes aus der seelenlosen Reflexion auftauchen. Etwas, was vage an ein Bewusstsein erinnert.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your confident voice reverberates through the metal room. The Drukhari blinks. Then blinks again. The mirror-like surface of his eyes seems to ripple, as if something else is beginning to surface apart from the soulless reflection, something vaguely resembling awareness.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Deine selbstbewusste Stimme hallt durch den metallenen Raum. Der Drukhari blinzelt. Blinzelt erneut. Die spiegelähnliche Oberfläche seiner Augen scheint sich zu kräuseln, als würde etwas anderes aus der seelenlosen Reflexion auftauchen. Etwas, was vage an ein Bewusstsein erinnert.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

languages.text: {n}Tu voz confiada reverbera por las paredes metálicas de la estancia. El Drukhari parpadea. Luego vuelve a parpadear. La superficie espejada de sus ojos parece ondear, como si emergiese de ellos algo más que un reflejo sin alma, algo que se asemeja vagamente a la lucidez.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your confident voice reverberates through the metal room. The Drukhari blinks. Then blinks again. The mirror-like surface of his eyes seems to ripple, as if something else is beginning to surface apart from the soulless reflection, something vaguely resembling awareness.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Tu voz confiada reverbera por las paredes metálicas de la estancia. El Drukhari parpadea. Luego vuelve a parpadear. La superficie espejada de sus ojos parece ondear, como si emergiese de ellos algo más que un reflejo sin alma, algo que se asemeja vagamente a la lucidez.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

languages.text: {n}Öz güvenli sesin, metal odada yankılanıyor. Drukhari, gözlerini kırpıyor. Ardından tekrar kırpıyor. Gözlerinin aynamsı yüzeyi hafifçe dalgalanıyor, sanki bilincinin yeniden varlık bulma çabası gözlerine yansıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your confident voice reverberates through the metal room. The Drukhari blinks. Then blinks again. The mirror-like surface of his eyes seems to ripple, as if something else is beginning to surface apart from the soulless reflection, something vaguely resembling awareness.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Öz güvenli sesin, metal oda boyunca yankılanıyor. Drukhari gözlerini kırpıyor. Ardından tekrar kırpıyor. Gözlerinin aynamsı yüzeyi, sanki ruhsuz yansıma haricî bir şey, farkındalığı andıran bir şey yüzeye çıkmaya başlıyormuş gibi dalgalanıyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC
